title: Find the Missing Shipment
content: l prevent you to get the Harold crossbow. He also mentions that he knows someone in Baldur's Gate who can take the cargo from you. He cautions against trying to deceive him because he has connections all over. Rugan invites you to his hideout and tells his associates to expect your arrival. Your quest journal will then show progress in the "Find the Shipment" quest. Now, you have the opportunity to open the chest using Thieves' Tools. If your dexterity is high enough, the chest will open. Inside
